ygData.subject: Re: Which race?
ygData.msgSnippet: I walk most of Freeport pretty much untouched, I won t go into the various temple areas out of fear of not being able to retrieve my belongings though, I know
ygData.messageBody:
I walk most of Freeport pretty much untouched, I won't go into the various
temple areas out of fear of not being able to retrieve my belongings though,
I know the magic user guild area has several npc's that are quite hostile
towards me, makes it a pain to get those spells not sold by the necro guild
leaders.

> The guards in that area are "corrupt" so they tend to be nicer to some of
hte
> races...
>
> But watch North Freeport. It is run by the paladins. I know as a Dark
Elf
> Necro... I a KOS there... Not sure about a human necro... may not be any
> more welcome.
>
> Sonoroud
